prompts.trueText: I am a {demographic} with a monthly allowance of RM{allowance} and monthly income of RM{income}.
prompts.falseText: I am a {demographic} with a monthly allowance of RM{allowance}.

prompts.trueText: I also have RM{investment} of investments.
prompts.falseText: I do not have any investments.

then.falseText: I am an {demographic} who is currently {employment} and I do not have a stable income.

else.text: I am an {demographic} who is currently {employment}.

prompts.text: I am currently working in the {industry} industry.

prompts.trueText: I also have RM{investment} of investments.
prompts.falseText: I do not have any investments.

prompts.trueText: Every month I spend a total of around RM{monthlyExpenses}.
prompts.falseText: Every month I spend a total of around RM{monthlyExpenses} with RM{fixedExpenses} as my fixed monthly mandatory expenses.

prompts.trueText: I also have RM{debt} of debt/loan to pay off.
prompts.falseText: I do not have any debts or loans.

prompts.text: Other than that, I usually spend RM{biggestSpendAmount} on {biggestSpend}.
I am aiming to save an amount of RM{saveAmount} each month.

prompts.trueText: I am financially dependent and would need to rely on my parents for financial support.
prompts.falseText: I am financially independent and would need to support my own living expenses.

prompts.trueText: I also have RM{epf} in my EPF account.
prompts.falseText: I do not have any EPF savings.
